column4: Hi i just got an archos it has a usb mass storage i am using ubuntu hardy heron on gnome does anyone know how i can get it to work with the mp3 players such as rythmbox or amarok?
you need to bring a bit of patience
give it ten minutes or so, then repeat your question. In the meantime, try a web search on e.g. site:ubuntuforums.org ubuntu archos music
